name: StrangeIndia
0:
”Alexa, open strange india”
”Alexa, ask strange india to amaze me”
”Alexa, ask strange india to tell me a strange fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: strange india
des:
Strange India is an skill made to introduce new and amazing facts of this culturally rich country - India.
Being a secular country it is a home for some of the world's weird or flabbergasting taboos.
Get your hands on it and you'll come to know the knowledge which even a large percentage of its citizen is unaware of !!!!

Instructions :
1)Just enable it and get started with your new discoveries.
2)Say "repeat" to listen the same fact again.
3)Enriched with "yes" , "no" and "next" functions to enhance communication and make it feel natural.
4)Enough for a day? Bid a "Goodbye" buddy.

Thanks for your effort of reading till here.
Do send me suggestions of something you know about India which you wanna let others also know at - satviksrijanbestfriend@gmail.com 

Enjoy Learning !!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
